product_name: The North Face Impulse Active Pants - Men's
long_description: Run hard and stay comfortable in cool weather with the lightweight warmth of The North Face Impulse Active pants. Their stretchy, lightweight fabric dries quickly and wicks moisture away from skin. Polyester and elastane fabric in the main section of the pants moves sweat away from the skin so it can evaporate quickly, increasing your comfort. Polyester mesh panels feature FlashDry(TM) fibers to improve drying time and breathability and help regulate your body temperature. UV-resistant fabric with a UPF 50+ rating shields skin from the sun's harmful ultraviolet rays. Features an elastic drawcord waist, 2 zippered hand pockets and a security pocket. Ankle zippers provide easy dressing over running shoes. The North Face Impulse Active pants feature reflective logos to increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Run hard and stay comfortable in cool weather with the lightweight warmth of The North Face Impulse Active pants. Their stretchy, lightweight fabric dries quickly and wicks moisture away from skin.
